function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Marketers not monitoring consumer attitudes, emotions, and usage trends in real time","Impact":"Missed opportunities to adapt promotional messaging and channels to target market segments","Mitigation":"Implement real-time monitoring tools and analytics to track consumer behavior and preferences","Technologies":"Real-time social media monitoring tools, analytics software","People":"Marketers and marketing teams","Owner":"Marketing teams and analytics specialists"},{"Description":"Panic buying among Survivalist consumers due to product shortages and stockouts","Impact":"Escalation of panic buying behaviors and potential violent retaliations from other consumers","Mitigation":"Provide timely updates on product availability, store hours, and delivery options through preferred communication channels","Technologies":"Real-time communication platforms, inventory management systems","People":"Survivalist consumers, other consumers","Owner":"Marketing teams, supply chain management"},{"Description":"Difficulty in engaging Rejectionist consumers due to defensive avoidance route","Impact":"Loss of engagement and relationship with Rejectionist consumers","Mitigation":"Stay engaged through preferred communication channels with product and service offering updates, avoiding pandemic references conflicting with confirmation bias","Technologies":"Targeted communication platforms, customer relationship management (CRM) systems","People":"Rejectionist consumers, marketing teams","Owner":"Marketing teams"}]}
